title: Starstruck
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict management
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Decision-making
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Adolescent psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Choice (Psychology) in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conflict management
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Autonomy in adolescence
description: Depicts the conflicts faced by an adolescent girl who must choose between her dream to be a singer-song writer or living up to her mother's hopes by following a secure but not totally satisfying career as a bookkeeper. This film would be useful for discussion of values, decision making and communication. Cast includes Trini Alvarado, Joanna Merlin. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
